metadata.title: CVE-2015-8923 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The process_extra function in libarchive before 3.2.0 uses the size fieldand a signed number in an offset, which allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (crash) via a crafted zip file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8923` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.2
bsdtar - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.2
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.2').
